meanings.definition: A large pot used for making stock or soup.
meanings.sent1: My mom always uses her stockpot to make delicious chicken soup.
meanings.sent2: The chef stirred the vegetables in the stockpot to make a flavorful broth.
meanings.sent3: When the stockpot started singing, we knew the soup was ready!
meanings.sent4: The stockpot bubbled like a magical cauldron, filling the kitchen with savory aromas.
meanings.sent5: The stockpot, with its steam rising, symbolized warmth and comfort in the cold winter.
